channel.title: Write on Tan Ho
channel.description: Recent content in Write on Tan Ho

item.title: Start to write
item.author: user@example.com (Hugo Author)
item.description: Language learning has always been a challenge for me, even with my native Vietnamese. Despite years of studying English, I still find myself working hard to improve. No, the paragraph above is not my original one. It’s the version from Gemini. And my second one as well. And … But that doesn’t matter now. I’ve decided to start a blog to practice my writing. As a software engineer, I believe it will help me deepen my technical knowledge and build a personal portfolio.
